title: I fucking hate nutritional science
body:
Just watched a Ted Talks video of a PhD Doctor who claimed they reversed type 2 diabetes by dropping carbs and eating a high fat diet.

Then I watched another Ted Talks video of a PhD Doctor who claimed they reversed type 2 diabetes by dropping fat and protein and eating veggies and carbs.

"EGGS ARE BAD" "NO WAIT EGGS ARE GOOD" "MILK DOES A BODY GOOD" "MILK WILL KILL YOU" "BUTTER WILL KILL YOU" "BUTTER WILL SAVE YOUR LIFE" "EGGS ARE BAD AGAIN BUT ONLY SOMETIMES MAYBE"

How the hell are you ever supposed to figure out the truth when highly educated people are citing scientific studies that make the complete opposite claims? I can already predict that half the people replying to this will side with the first video and half with the second and a few randos will talk about something in between. No one really knows anything, it is all just a guessing game. What is poison today will be a cure tomorrow. 

I'm just going to not eat anything, that is the only way to beat the system.
